[ Beginners ]

You will receive benefits for the beginners from now on.
Beginners will receive the following benefits until they reach level 25.
1. Equipment Trade: Used weapons or armor can be traded for better equipment by paying the difference in price. Please talk to the armor shop merchants.
2. Supplemental Magic: You can ask the beginner's guide to cast the supplemental magic. Supplemental magic can be a big help during battle. You can receive supplemental magic after level 6, and support up to level 75.
3. Additional supplies of the Soulshot and Spiritshot for beginners You will receive an additional reward upon completion of the specific quest. Now, meet the Sentinel Rayen of Elven Village. He will give you a quest for defeating the Kaboo Orcs who invaded the Elven Forest.
If you accomplish this quest, you will receive the Soulshot or Spiritshot for beginners as an additional reward.
